UniprotID	P16333
Accession	P16333;B7Z751;D3DNE3
EntryName	NCK1_HUMAN
ProteinName	SH2/SH3 adapter protein NCK1 (Cytoplasmic protein NCK1) (NCK adapter protein 1) (Nck-1) (SH2/SH3 adapter protein NCK-alpha)
GeneName	NCK1 NCK
Length	377
Function	Adapter protein which associates with tyrosine-phosphorylated growth factor receptors, such as KDR and PDGFRB, or their cellular substrates. Maintains low levels of EIF2S1 phosphorylation by promoting its dephosphorylation by PP1. Plays a role in the DNA damage response, not in the detection of the damage by ATM/ATR, but for efficient activation of downstream effectors, such as that of CHEK2. Plays a role in ELK1-dependent transcriptional activation in response to activated Ras signaling. Modulates the activation of EIF2AK2/PKR by dsRNA. May play a role in cell adhesion and migration through interaction with ephrin receptors.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Endoplasmic reticulum; Nucleus
Disorder	0.0870,0.1349,0.0835,0.0690,0.0765,0.1115,0.1501,0.1852,0.2258,0.2609,0.2129,0.2436,0.1914,0.1823,0.1759,0.2399,0.3019,0.3494,0.3321,0.2609,0.1969,0.2258,0.2224,0.3117,0.3631,0.3840,0.3740,0.2645,0.1702,0.1583,0.1115,0.1643,0.1671,0.2364,0.2034,0.2193,0.2034,0.1969,0.2002,0.1731,0.2094,0.3019,0.3704,0.3740,0.2783,0.2224,0.2328,0.2292,0.3215,0.4256,0.4220,0.4582,0.4541,0.4330,0.4119,0.4476,0.3566,0.3087,0.2988,0.3087,0.3392,0.3872,0.3740,0.3807,0.2951,0.3840,0.3631,0.3599,0.3566,0.3087,0.2884,0.2884,0.3053,0.3392,0.3426,0.3087,0.3392,0.4220,0.4766,0.4582,0.4441,0.5533,0.5296,0.5296,0.5382,0.6269,0.4979,0.5176,0.5296,0.5665,0.6427,0.6661,0.6712,0.5758,0.4476,0.4619,0.4441,0.4292,0.3872,0.4186,0.4186,0.3392,0.2575,0.2783,0.1731,0.1759,0.1162,0.1702,0.2002,0.2034,0.1759,0.1852,0.1823,0.1942,0.2002,0.2783,0.2002,0.2002,0.1852,0.2193,0.1969,0.2129,0.2436,0.2258,0.1823,0.2470,0.2436,0.3182,0.2884,0.3087,0.3087,0.3117,0.2129,0.1323,0.1229,0.1791,0.1791,0.1671,0.2470,0.2541,0.2609,0.2034,0.2064,0.1731,0.1501,0.2164,0.2503,0.2503,0.1759,0.1852,0.1914,0.1942,0.2064,0.2951,0.3983,0.3983,0.4220,0.3566,0.4441,0.4476,0.4441,0.3774,0.4369,0.4330,0.4541,0.5665,0.5533,0.5456,0.4619,0.5254,0.5620,0.4979,0.4256,0.4220,0.4330,0.3460,0.3566,0.3356,0.4051,0.4186,0.3494,0.2817,0.3286,0.2752,0.2224,0.3019,0.2783,0.1942,0.1298,0.2064,0.1424,0.1583,0.2034,0.2541,0.2541,0.2575,0.3426,0.3460,0.2715,0.2817,0.1731,0.2364,0.2988,0.3053,0.3740,0.3774,0.3321,0.3704,0.3872,0.4017,0.3910,0.4864,0.5176,0.5382,0.5533,0.5533,0.5707,0.5665,0.4541,0.4330,0.4186,0.4441,0.4256,0.4256,0.3494,0.3460,0.4017,0.4051,0.3392,0.3948,0.3983,0.3286,0.3599,0.3286,0.3249,0.2364,0.1731,0.1554,0.1070,0.1449,0.2328,0.2503,0.3356,0.3667,0.3053,0.3840,0.3704,0.3704,0.3356,0.4017,0.4256,0.4940,0.5901,0.5951,0.6136,0.5017,0.6183,0.5807,0.4901,0.5533,0.6269,0.6136,0.5098,0.5017,0.4766,0.5456,0.4292,0.4087,0.4087,0.4901,0.5055,0.3774,0.3019,0.1942,0.1731,0.1611,0.1791,0.1731,0.2470,0.3215,0.3286,0.2817,0.2951,0.3321,0.3
